name: FireCat
description:
The city of MewTown is mostly quiet, but when things get out of control Perejilo and Apiosin  must go and save the day, help them put out the fire, avoid the flames and save the other cats

An Asimetric Arcade Game for 2 persons reminder of "Game and Watch" games

  Turn Off the cats

  Save the cats

  Don't let the building burn

Controls:

A-MoveLeft

D-MoveRight

Space-Reload Water

Mouse-Point

LeftClick-Shoot Water

Enjoy UwU Nya

Credits:

Santiago Canales Franco: Art, Programming, Design

Keter Moyrón Rivera: Programming, Design, Sounds
